arts.ttl: Brighton come from behind to beat Brentford
arts.sum: Jack Hinshelwood scores on his return from injury to help Brighton come from behind to beat Brentford 2-1 in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: 'Data derby' comeback! Brighton show fighting spirit to overcome Brentford
arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion come from behind against in-form Brentford to snatch all three points in a 2-1 Premier League win at the Amex Stadium on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Late penalty drama as Brighton claim comeback win over Brentford
arts.sum: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Brighton's win against Brentford in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Late Bart Verbruggen penalty save helps Brighton to victory over Brentford
arts.sum: Second-half goals by Danny Welbeck and Jack Hinshelwood put Brighton ahead before Bart Verbruggen’s spot-kick heroics.

arts.ttl: Verbruggen the penalty hero as Brighton beat Brentford to go fifth
arts.sum: Bart Verbruggen was the Brighton hero as his stoppage-time penalty save from Igor Thiago earned the Seagulls a 2-1 win over Brentford to take them up to fifth in the Premier League table.

arts.ttl: Brighton vs Brentford – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Fabian Hürzeler reaches a significant milestone on Saturday as he takes charge of his 50th Premier League match for Brighton. At just 32 years old, he becomes the youngest manager ever to reach 50 games in the competition. Consequently, he will be desperate to mark the occasion with a victory. arts.ttl: Brighton vs Brentford – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion welcome Brentford to the Amex Stadium on Saturday, looking to extend a formidable unbeaten home record. Fabian Hürzeler’s side have turned their ground into a fortress. In fact, they are unbeaten in their last nine top-flight matches on home soil. However, they face a Brentford side sitting just one place below […] The post Brighton vs Brentford – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Brentford XI vs Brighton – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Saturday’s clash at the Amex Stadium presents a stern test for a Brentford side desperate to correct their poor form on the road. The Bees have lost four of their five away games this season. Unfortunately, they face a Brighton side against whom they have a difficult recent away record. Interestingly, Brentford are winless in […] The post Brentford XI vs Brighton – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Brighton vs Brentford: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 12, 2025
arts.sum: The Bees record at the Gtech Community Stadium has been superb with 13 points from six games (four wins, one draw and one loss). Brentford are on a brilliant run of form now and head to the AMEX Stadium looking for their first away win at Brighton since September 2016.

arts.ttl: Brighton vs. Brentford injury, suspension list, predicted XIs
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up all of the latest team news ahead of Saturday’s Premier League clash between Brighton & Hove Albion and Brentford.
